decisions.description: Checks which document was uploaded based on the document title (DocumentName variable).
decisions.name: Decision_Which_Document
decisions.label: Which document was uploaded?

rules.name: Loss_or_Change_of_Income_Document

rightValue.stringValue: Loss or Change of Income Document

rules.label: Loss or Change of Income Document

decisions.name: Which_Object_was_a_file_uploaded_to
decisions.label: Which Object was a file uploaded to

Flow.description: - This flow checks which document was uploaded based on the title and sets the corresponding document checkbox field on the Opportunity to true. (e.g. if the 1st Letter of Recommendation is uploaded, the 1st Letter of Recommendation checkbox is set to true). - Invoked when a new document is uploaded or updated on any record.
Flow.label: Opportunity Document Check

recordLookups.description: Gets the Enrollment Record record where the new document was uploaded.
recordLookups.name: Get_Enrollment_Record
recordLookups.label: Get Enrollment Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the opportunity record where the new document was uploaded.
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_0
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity
